name: Nginx Proxy Manager
description: Easy-to-use reverse proxy with SSL certificate management and web interface.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  nginx-proxy-manager:
    image: jc21/nginx-proxy-manager:latest
    container_name: nginx-proxy-manager
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - '{{HTTP_PORT}}:80'
      - '{{HTTPS_PORT}}:443'
      - '{{ADMIN_PORT}}:81'
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/data
      - {{LETSENCRYPT_PATH}}:/etc/letsencrypt
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=nginx-proxy-manager"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=web"

notes: Automatic SSL certificates via Let's Encrypt
